serviceDescription: Run various AI models from Replicate, including image generation, background removal, and more. Outputs are handled based on model type, with images uploaded to cloud storage.

runReplicateModel.description: Run any model on Replicate by providing the model identifier and input object. Handles image outputs by uploading to storage.

parameters.input: A JSON object containing the input parameters for the specified model.
parameters.outputType: Optional: Specify the expected output type to help guide processing. Defaults to 'image' if output is a URL.
parameters.filename: Optional: If the output is an image, this will be used as the filename when uploading to storage.

errors.invalidModel: Invalid model identifier: Must be a non-empty string.
errors.invalidInput: Invalid input: Must be a JSON object.
errors.predictionFailed: Replicate prediction failed or timed out.

runReplicateImageModel.description: Run an image-generating or image-processing model on Replicate. The image output will be uploaded to storage.

parameters.model: The Replicate model identifier for an image model.
parameters.input: A JSON object containing the input parameters for the image model.
parameters.filename: Optional: Custom filename for the generated/processed image when uploading to storage.

errors.invalidModel: Invalid model identifier: Must be a non-empty string.
errors.invalidInput: Invalid input: Must be a JSON object.
errors.predictionFailed: Replicate image model prediction failed or timed out.
errors.imageProcessingFailed: Failed to download or upload the image from Replicate.

runReplicateImageModel.success: Replicate image model executed successfully. Image available at: {{imageUrl}}
